backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining the Ribbit backend with storage, access control, and core data models for ponds, posts (lilies), ribbits, users, likes, activity tracking, and usernames, including upgrade-safe role restoration.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report describing implemented frontend bookmark and Saved Lilies features, listing affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of frontend React components, pages, hooks, and utilities used as documentation or planning reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app, sets metadata, favicon, viewport, and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, toaster notifications, and registering all main pages including Saved Lilies.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: UI button component that toggles a local bookmark state for a lily using the useBookmarks hook and displays a filled or outlined bookmark icon.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Placeholder or empty file intended for rendering individual comment (ribbit) items.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Placeholder or empty file intended for emoji or reaction UI functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component rendering navigation links, copyright text, and attribution with iconography.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with branding, search, navigation links, mobile menus, user avatar display, and actions for creating content.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper that composes Header, Footer, routed content outlet, and manages mobile left sidebar drawer state on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the main left navigation with links (Home, Ponds, Create, Saved, Settings) and a recent activity list, highlighting active routes and supporting mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post (lily) card with avatar, metadata, content preview, image handling, and interactive actions like like, share, bookmark, and counts fetched via hooks.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide-in mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar, including a scrim overlay and body scroll locking when open.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: File is empty or contains no implementation.
File is empty or contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a single ribbit (comment) with nested replies, avatar, timestamp, like functionality, and an inline reply form with depth-based indentation.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Renders the right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts computed from fetched pond and lily data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on identity, and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages client-side bookmarked lily IDs using localStorage, exposing helpers to toggle, add, remove, and query bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context, hook, and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login/logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a collection of React Query hooks and mutations for interacting with backend actors, covering ponds, memberships, user profiles, posts, and related cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, base element styles, and a small custom utility for hover effects.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Utility function that formats large numbers into abbreviated strings (k, M, B) with one decimal of precision.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Helper to share a lily URL via the Web Share API with clipboard-based fallbacks and user feedback via toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Client-side user utilities managing anonymous usernames, user IDs, and a recoverable "Froggy Phrase" using localStorage with simple hashing and backups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that renders the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page component describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines with styled layout and separators.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all ponds with loading states, member counts, and a Joined badge for ponds the user belongs to, plus a button to start a new pond.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new Lily (text, image, or link) with pond selection, tag suggestions, image upload preview, and validation requiring pond membership.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with required metadata, banner and profile image uploads with previews, froggy phrase validation, and submission via createPond mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: File is present but contains no implementation or content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search support, loading skeletons, and left/right sidebars on desktop.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single Lily post with image handling, likes, views, sharing, bookmarking, and a threaded ribbit (comment) section with creation support.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a pond including description, moderators, visibility, creation date, and allows members to leave the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond feed page that fetches pond metadata, membership state, and lilies, supports joining a pond, and displays lilies sorted by newest with loading and not-found states plus sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: File is currently empty or missing implementation, likely intended to render an individual lily/post detail page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays a list of locally bookmarked lilies, fetching each lily by ID, handling removed/missing posts, and allowing users to remove bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows a feed of lilies for a given tag with canonical tag redirection, sorting tabs, pond context display, and standard left/right sidebars with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Implements a comprehensive user settings page for username management, avatar upload, profile editing, joined ponds, froggy phrase backup, and admin-only tag management features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with class-based dark mode, OKLCH semantic color tokens, container sizing, custom animations, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and feature inventory, summarizing ribbit’s architecture, frontend stack, backend capabilities, and implemented features with versioning.
